bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of uncontrolled shivering movements of the head. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：沒藥、血竭、乳香，並消腫止痛生肌，癰疽頭顫，熟水 研服 , “ Mo yao , xue jie , and ru xiang , they all dissolve swelling, stop pain, and generate muscles, [also, for] obstruction- and impediment-illnesses, and when the head shivers , grind [these substances] with boiled water and ingest this”.
